choices.text: A command to speed up Git operations
A branching model with specific branch types (main, develop, feature, release, hotfix)
A complex branching strategy with many branch types
A simpler workflow: branch from main, work, open PR, merge
A tool only available on GitHub

question: When might you choose Git Flow over GitHub Flow?

choices.text: When you have scheduled releases and need to maintain multiple versions

question: Trunk-based development encourages long-lived feature branches.
What is the purpose of a "develop" branch in Git Flow?

choices.text: To serve as the integration branch for features before release
